thread.title: Bribery Trial Complicates New York Gov. Cuomo’s Reelection Bid

author: Mike Vilensky
title: Bribery Trial Complicates New York Gov. Cuomo’s Reelection Bid
text:
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo has spent the past few weeks laying out his agenda for the year, but a federal bribery trial starting Monday involving a former aide could distract from his plans.
With the Cuomo administration expected to play a role in the courtroom drama, experts said the trial could have political implications for the Democratic governor, who is running for a third term.
“Obviously,... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
